name: Hookem & Bookem
description:
In Hookem & Bookem, you are asked to police the downtown area of the city where all manner of criminals hang out. Locate and catch the suspect(s) as fast as possible for maximum points. 

Drive the car using WASD or cursor keys.

NOTE
This is not a complete project. The game is playable through 2 levels but may contain bugs.  Press Esc to return to the main menu if things get completely tied up.

The idea came from wanting to prototype a Crazy Taxi clone (original working title of Fare Game) that then morphed into a 'police calls' game. The bank robbery level is inspired by mechanics from the Chase HQ arcade game where you 'ram' the suspect vehicle.
